fields.name: Enchantment: Runeglaive
fields.description: +50 Ability Power +200 Mana +10% Cooldown Reduction UNIQUE Passive - Spellblade: After using an ability, the next basic attack deals 100% Base Attack Damage (+30% of Ability Power) bonus magic damage on hit (1.5 second cooldown). When directly attacking a monster, the bonus damage is reapplied in an AoE around the target, and 8% of your missing Mana is restored.
